info.description: This is the venue service API for the coworking booking system.
info.title: Venue Service API

get.description: Get list of all amenities (Admin/Moderator only)
Get detailed information of an amenity by ID (Admin/Moderator only)

put.description: Update an existing amenity by ID (Admin/Moderator only)

delete.description: Delete an amenity by ID (Admin/Moderator only)

put.description: Approve a venue by ID (Admin/Moderator only)
Block a venue by ID (Admin/Moderator only)

get.description: Search spaces with filters and availability in a time range
Retrieve detailed information of a space by ID

put.description: Update information of a space (user must be authenticated)

delete.description: Delete a space by ID (user must be authenticated)

put.description: Assign or update manager for a space (user must be authenticated)

get.description: Get list of venues accessible by the user

post.description: Create a new venue (user must be authenticated)

get.description: Get detailed info of a venue by ID

put.description: Update a venue by ID (user must be authenticated)

delete.description: Delete a venue by ID (user must be authenticated)

post.description: Add an existing amenity to a venue (user must be authenticated)
post.summary: Add an amenity to a venue

delete.description: Remove a specific amenity from a venue (user must be authenticated)
delete.summary: Remove an amenity from a venue

post.description: Create a new space under a specific venue (user must be authenticated)
post.summary: Create a new space under a venue
